ygData.subject: Misunderstandings.
ygData.msgSnippet: Apparently, I was misunderstood. I have no problem with RP, in fact, I am a D&D veteran of almost 20 years, and I truly understand role playing.  I enjoy
ygData.messageBody:
Apparently, I was misunderstood.
I have no problem with RP, in fact, I am a D&D veteran of almost 20
years, and I truly understand role playing. I enjoy hearing of tales from
afar, of wondrous sights to behold in the characters' home cities, or of
their abilities against the beasties. What I asked to have stopped was the
endless, immature, back-and-forth child-like banter of "Your character
sucks, and mine is SOOOO superior because..." crap. Thats all I was asking.
If this is too much, then fine, I will go away and look for the intelligent
correspondence I assumed this would be.
